notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: M.B. and I.N. had the idea for the experiment, grew the plants, made the composts, prepared the samples and applied for the funding and visited the UK for detailed analysis of the samples under the European Plant Phenotyping Network in May 2013. G.A. was responsible for analysis of the samples by FTIR spectroscopy and GC/MS and G.A. conducted statistical and chemometric analysis of the experimental data. S.J. was responsible for analysis of samples by TGA and subsequent data processing. G.A., M.B. and I.N. shared in writing the MS.
